text: wanh subhanah wteala 'ahlak eadana alawla, wahum qawm hwd, wa'ahlak thmwd, wahum qawm salh, falam yubq minhum ahdana, wa'ahlak qawm nuh qblu. hwla' kanuu 'ashada tmrdana wa'aezam kfrana min aladhin jawu min bedhm. wmdayn qawm lut qalbiha allah elyhm, wajaeal ealiaha saflha, falbsha ma albsha min alhjart
